name: TEA TAKLI
detail: Handicraft has its roots in the rural crafts—the material-goods necessities—of ancient civilizations
description: A handicraft, sometimes more precisely expressed as artisanal handicraft or handmade, is any of a wide variety of types of work where useful and decorative objects are made completely by one’s hand or by using only simple, non-automated related tools like scissors, carving implements, or hooks.
